passage_text: [ syll. u-zma, uz-ma ] The baby girl name Uzma is pronounced UW ZMAH †. Uzma has its origins in the Spanish language. The name means 'a capable woman'. Variation transcriptions of Uzma include Usma, Usmah, and Uzmah. Uzma is not frequently used as a baby girl name. It is not listed in the top 1000.

The name Uzma is a Muslim baby name. In Muslim the meaning of the name Uzma is: Greatest. SoulUrge Number: 4. Expression Number: 7. People with this name have a deep inner desire for order and physical creativity, and want to be involved in conventional, safe activities. People with this name are excellent at analyzing, understanding, and learning.
